sqls.name: getSystemInfo
sqls.sql: SELECT VERSION() as db_version, NOW() as current_time, DATABASE() as current_db

sqls.name: checkTableExists
sqls.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name = :tableName

sqls.name: getTableInfo
sqls.sql: SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_name = :tableName ORDER BY ordinal_position
